My guy, annie ult isn't point and click, but more importantly, how would you implement some of the point and click ultimates instead? lets look at zil. if his ult was a skillshot it would strictly feel worse to play as zil, or on the same team as zil. In a frantic fight there few things as disappointing as a wiffed ulti, and you can add to that the anger at watching an ally dodge your ult because they also had to dodge the cho gath rupture at the same location. How about karthus, how would you mechanically remake his ult without changing the theme of the champion? currently the r cast channel makes sense with his banshee like nature singing the dirge of his foes. if we preserve the current functionallity and change it instead to a global ulti with either linear or circular skillshots, and perhaps give 5 charges so he can hit each champ, we basically have a ezreal or xerath ulti, but in a way that gives up the unique nature and thematic of karthus' ult. To change the point and click ults in many cases would require a complete rework of many ultimates, and in many cases a rebalancing of kits, as typically point and click spells are less powerful than their skillshot counterparts as a means of balancing their reliability.
